title: Full screen mode resolution
body: So i use GPU scaling to make my screen fit my monitor... this has never been an issue before.  but for some reason specifically LOL when it runs on full screen mode changes my resolution or turns of the GPU scaling so that i cant see the edges of the screen.... please help, its really annoying.

replies.body:
I had to do a little digging for this, but it looks like some of the recent Windows 10 updates have been auto-enabling a "fullscreen optimization" setting. Do me a favor and check for that option with these steps really quickly!

- Open up C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.195\deploy
 -   **(use the latest numbered folder if not this one)**


- Right-click on League of Legends.exe and click on Properties
- Click on the Compatibility tab
- Check the box for "Disable fullscreen optimizations"
- Press Apply, then OK.

The latest number is 0.0.1.198  and when i open the exe "comparability"  is not a tab the options are general/ sharing/security/ previous versions / customize and i didnt see that box for disable full screen optimization anywhere ....

Update: i have found what you were referring to, checked the box for full screen optimization and it did not solve the problem. the full screen mode of lol still extend about an inch or two past my monitor. it is worth noting that if i use border less windowed  mode it fits the monitor properly however is obviously MUCH MUCH slower and only about 20-30 FPM... where full screen normally runs around 50-60 so really not an ideal solution.
